input.sentences: i was on vacation last weekend .
the buildings were all old and beautiful .
i went for a walk many times .
i had a great time there .
output.sentences: This month, I decided to go visit historic downtown for my weekend vacation
The old buildings were very beautiful, inside and out.
The statues in the public gardens were amazing!
I spent most of the weekend on a long walk, thinking about other times
My weekend vacation felt like a trip to a different time, and I was sad when it was time to go.
